HotelElement.Name: Kantary Hotel and Serviced Apartments, Ayutthaya

Address.Address1: MOO 1, ROJANA ROAD, T. TANU, A. U-THAI 168

Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Kantary Hotel and Serviced Apartments, Ayutthaya in Ayutthaya, you'll be in the historical district and convenient to Wat Yai Chaimongkon and Ayutthaya Historical Park. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Wat Phra Mahathat and Wat Ratchaburana.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 193 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring microwaves and LCD televisions. Rooms have private lanais. Cable programming and DVD players are provided for your entertainment, while wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature deep soaking bathtubs and complimentary toiletries.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Don’t miss out on the many recreational opportunities, including an outdoor pool, a spa tub, and a sauna. Guests can catch a ride to nearby destinations on the area shuttle (surcharge).

Dining
Enjoy a bite to eat at a coffee shop/café, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours).

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Planning an event in Ayutthaya? This hotel has 198 square feet (18 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center and meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request).


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a bite to eat at a coffee shop/café, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours).
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Wat Yai Chaimongkon - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Ayutthaya Historical Park - 2.5 km / 1.6 mi
Wat Phra Mahathat - 4.4 km / 2.8 mi
Wat Ratchaburana - 4.5 km / 2.8 mi
Chao Sam Phraya Museum - 4.8 km / 3 mi
Wat Phra Ram - 4.9 km / 3.1 mi
Wihan Phra Mongkol Bophit - 5.3 km / 3.3 mi
Wat Phra Si Sanphet - 5.3 km / 3.3 mi
Wat Lokayasutha - 5.8 km / 3.6 mi
Wat Thammikarat - 6.9 km / 4.3 mi
Wat Chai Wattanaram - 7 km / 4.3 mi
Wat Phu Khao Thong - 7.7 km / 4.8 mi

The preferred airport for Kantary Hotel and Serviced Apartments, Ayutthaya is Bangkok (BKK-Suvarnabhumi Intl.) - 74.7 km / 46.4 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
